reviews.title: Biotin Shampoo for hair growth
reviews.review_text: Biotin Shampoo for Hair Growth - Volumizing Shampoo for Hair Loss - Thin Hair Shampoo - 16 fl oz. Since turning 50 I've noticed thinning and some hair loss, I have only had this product for a couple weeks so I think it's too early to tell if it does what it claims to do - I hope so! I did have some nice volume after my initial use, this shampoo feels nice while using it (e.g. not greasy or goopy), has a very light scent and comes with a pump, contains no harsh chemicals or parabens per the label and not tested on animals.

reviews.title: Majestic Biotin shampoo dht-3 blocker
reviews.review_text: havent noticed any difference in hair shed since using shampoo for two months. hair seems fine hasn't improved or worsen hair texture or hair loss.

reviews.title: Less hair loss
reviews.review_text: Hair feels thicker after continued use and noticeably less hair loss.
